name.jp: 舞闘Kaiグローブ(男の子用)

description.en: The Kai Gloves for male characters. Channel your Chi and POWER UP!

description.br: As luvas Kai para personagens masculinos. Concentre o seu KI e libere seu PODER!
description.cns: 男性气功帽。引导你的气并提高你的力量！
description.fi: The Kai Gloves for male characters. Channel your Chi and POWER UP!
description.fil: The Kai Gloves for male characters. Channel your Chi and POWER UP!
description.fr: Les bandages sur vos bras en disent long sur vos activités extra scolaires !

description.it: The Kai Gloves for male characters. Channel your Chi and POWER UP!
description.jp: 舞闘Kaiグローブ。カイをチャネリングしてパワーアップ！
description.kr: 남성 캐릭터용 카이 장갑. 기를 모아서 파워업!
description.nl: The Kai Gloves for male characters. Channel your Chi and POWER UP!
description.pl: The Kai Gloves for male characters. Channel your Chi and POWER UP!
description.ru: Рукавицы ци для мадригальца, буквально заряженные энергией!

description.sw: The Kai Gloves for male characters. Channel your Chi and POWER UP!
description.th: ถุงมือไก่สำหรับตัวละครชาย แชนเนล Chi และ POWER UP!
description.vi: Găng tay Kai dành cho các nhân vật nam. Theo dõi Chi và Tăng cường sức mạnh lên!
